de.must.dataobj
Class DataTextObjectWithDelimiter

java.lang.Object
  de.must.dataobj.DataTextObjectWithDelimiter

public class DataTextObjectWithDelimiter
extends java.lang.Object

Text file reader to access data in text files with fixed column position and delimiter.
